attributes.action: award Professor Stephen W. Hawking a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is quite simple.  This government should acknowledge the genious of Professor Stephen W. Hawking. And what he has done for this country.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "award Professor Stephen W. Hawking a Knighthood."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14255.asp

Prime Minister's Office
